answers.answer: Just listen to your doctors. I'm not a regular diabetic but I do have gestational diabetes. See if your OB office or hospital offers classes on being a diabetic while pregnant, I went to one and found it really helpful. As long as you eat healthy, exercise, and do what they tell you, you should be fine (:

question: I just found out I'm a type two diabetic and I'm 15weeks I'm scared that my baby will be a diabetic too...I need sone advice any help
title: diabetes and pregnant
